name: Picker Summary
query:
select a.picker as "Picker::200",count(a.sales_order) as "Total Sales Order:Float:150",concat(convert(sum(a.lama_waktu_pengerjaan_jam),char),':',
     convert(sum(a.lama_waktu_pengerjaan_menit),char),':',convert(sum(a.lama_waktu_pengerjaan_detik),char)) as "Lama Waktu Pengerjaan::250",sum(a.quantity) as "Quantity:Float:150" from (
     select pl.picker picker,pl.start_time start_time,pl.end_time end_time,hour(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)) lama_waktu_pengerjaan_jam,
          minute(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)) lama_waktu_pengerjaan_menit,second(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)) lama_waktu_pengerjaan_detik,
          pli.sales_order,soi.qty quantity  from `tabPick List` pl inner join `tabPick List Item` pli on pl.name = pli.parent
             inner join `tabSales Order Item` soi on pli.sales_order = soi.parent
          where pl.picker is not null and pli.sales_order is not null) a group by a.picker;
